name: U3177673_9755_Assignment3
description:
Built for HTC Vive VR Headset.

This is an augmented recreation of Fort Lytton, based near the Brisbane Suburb of Lytton. 

This is an augmented recreation of Fort Lytton. The recreation was set in the theme of the Dark Ages and features Castle Walls, Swords and a small treasury.

The Hands of the player in-game are larger than normal. While this does not effect the game-play, it was extremely difficult to try and correct and unfortunately was unable to resize them.
